about.title: Why Choose Me
about.description1: I deliver measurable results for aviation companies through specialized expertise in commercial aircraft maintenance and technical consultancy. My proven track record includes successful aircraft redelivery projects, airworthiness documentation, and seamless fleet transitions across multiple aircraft platforms.
about.description2: I work exclusively with major aircraft manufacturers including Airbus, Boeing, Embraer, ATR, and Fokker, providing comprehensive lessor inspections, records audits, and physical condition reviews that protect your investment and ensure regulatory compliance.

deliveryAuditor.title: Delivery Document Auditor
deliveryAuditor.description: Delivered comprehensive records audits including ADs, SBs, and APU documentation on several Embraer 195 aircraft, ensuring smooth delivery acceptance and regulatory compliance.

lessorRep.title: Lessor Representative
lessorRep.description: Successfully led comprehensive redelivery inspection and records audit of EMB 195 aircraft, exceeding lessor requirements and maintaining airworthiness standards.

systemsEngineer.title: Systems Engineer
systemsEngineer.description: Optimized MEL and maintenance programs for multiple aircraft types, served as technical liaison with OEMs, streamlined PMA material approvals, and successfully integrated ATR-42 into TAM fleet operations.

engineer.description: Planned and executed heavy maintenance and redelivery checks for A320/A330 fleets. Successfully managed aircraft and engine redelivery to major lessors including GECAS, JSA, MCAP, McLarens, and ACG.
